abstract: Officials say Hillary Clinton's use of non-secured computer server during her time as secretary of state could have consequences for several of her top aides, including Jake Sullivan, who made reference to classified information in some emails; emails are focus of investigations by FBI, State Dept inspectors general and intelligence agencies.
lead_paragraph: Much of the correspondence American diplomats had with Hillary Clinton when she was secretary of state went through an aide who routinely sent emails to her that should have been secret.

headline.main: Unclassified Clinton Emails May Have Consequences for a Key Deputy
headline.print_headline: Unclassified Clinton Emails May Have Consequences for a Key Deputy

snippet: Much of the correspondence American diplomats had with Hillary Clinton when she was secretary of state went through an aide who routinely sent emails to her that should have been secret.
